summary: Performed market landscape analysis of fintech and personal finance startups to shape early-stage B2B strategy. Created actionable market insights and analytics to support business development and investor presentations.
Assisted a crew of State Foresters overseeing public lands to sustain financial and environmental goals. Performed physical tasks, bookkeeping, and public outreach.
Aided a misdemeanor-division judge overseeing court trials and proceedings. Coordinated outreach to parties involved in courthouse cases.

Acted as intermediary between bakery staff and customers, coordinating orders and ensuring a positive shopping experience. Maintained cleanliness and organization while adhering to food safety standards.
